sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Base from "./Base"; import Checkout from "./Checkout"; import { loadform } from "./helper/Carthelper"; const Invoice =() =>{ const [details, setDetails] = useState({}); const current = new Date(); const date = `${current.getDate()}/${current.getMonth()+1}/${current.getFullYear()}`; useEffect(() => { setDetails(loadform()) }, []); return (
